about_the_game:
Charlie Charlie Challenge is a 1-4 player game inspired by the child's game in which you try to talk to ghosts though a paper and pencils. The game features speech recognition and does certain actions depending on what you ask. The goal of the game is to find Charlie, banish him, and then escape. This game is in active development and coming close to the end of production. If you have any ideas at all or would like to pitch in I highly suggest joining the discord, I am very active and would love to hear your input.


To keep up with the game, give suggestions, and see more screenshots the discord link is

Multiplayer

- Fully supports up to 4 player co-op giving you the ability to hunt or be hunted together.

Performance

- Designed to run on low end systems, and on high end systems supporting both extreme graphic fidelity or lower quality graphics.

VOIP

- This monster responds to what you say, not just how loud you are, but what words you say. The game also contains voice chat for multiplayer if you want to keep things even more difficult / immersive.

Difficulty

- As the match goes on Charlie gets significantly more difficult to work with.

Replayability

- The items in the map never spawn in the same location and it will always be a hunt to first find the main room where Charlie is.

Charlie

- Charlie is hard to predict, even for me and this will especially be the case for you. Good luck!

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains blood, and references to gore and horror.
